segment.source: To understand your tax considerations for price selection, payout implications, and tax responsibility, see your countries/regions of distribution in the tables below.

segment.source: Note Tax rates are subject to change at any time.

segment.source: Certain Microsoft billing partners may collect and remit sales, use, goods and services, value added or similar taxes, if any, applicable to Customers' acquisition of your App(s) or In-App Product(s) through the Store in the countries/regions listed below.
segment.target: Certain Microsoft billing partners may collect and remit sales, use, goods and services, value added or similar taxes, if any, applicable to Customers' acquisition of your App(s) or In-App Product(s) through the Store in the countries/regions listed below.

segment.source: The reports that Microsoft makes available to you will identify the transactions for which a billing partner has collected sales, use, goods and services, value added or similar taxes applicable to Customers' acquisition of your App(s) or In-App Product(s) through the Store.
segment.target: The reports that Microsoft makes available to you will identify the transactions for which a billing partner has collected sales, use, goods and services, value added or similar taxes applicable to Customers' acquisition of your App(s) or In-App Product(s) through the Store.

segment.source: Except for the transactions described in such reporting, neither Microsoft nor its billing services providers will remit any sales, use, goods and services, value added or other similar tax in connection with Customers' acquisition of your App(s) or In-App Product(s) in these country(s).
segment.target: Except for the transactions described in such reporting, neither Microsoft nor its billing services providers will remit any sales, use, goods and services, value added or other similar tax in connection with Customers' acquisition of your App(s) or In-App Product(s) in these country(s).

segment.source: You are responsible for reviewing the reporting provided to you and determining and complying with your obligations, if any, to register, collect, and remit taxes in connection with transactions involving your App(s) or In-App Product(s).
segment.target: You are responsible for reviewing the reporting provided to you and determining and complying with your obligations, if any, to register, collect, and remit taxes in connection with transactions involving your App(s) or In-App Product(s).

segment.source: In certain countries/regions, Microsoft acts as a reseller, rather than your agent, in making your app(s) and in-app product(s) available in the Store.
segment.target: In certain countries/regions, Microsoft acts as a reseller, rather than your agent, in making your app(s) and in-app product(s) available in the Store.

segment.source: For further details about terms and conditions for reseller countries/regions, see the App Developer Agreement.
segment.target: For further details about terms and conditions for reseller countries/regions, see the App Developer Agreement.

segment.source: China (except on mobile communication devices running Windows Phone 7.x and on personal computers running Windows 8.x)
segment.target: China (except on mobile communication devices running Windows Phone 7.x and on personal computers running Windows 8.x)

segment.source: Brazil (only for purchases made via devices running Windows 10 and purchases made through mobile operator billing)
segment.target: Brazil (only for purchases made via devices running Windows 10 and purchases made through mobile operator billing)

segment.source: To obtain information relevant to remitting taxes for your Store transactions in India, generate a transaction report.
segment.target: To obtain information relevant to remitting taxes for your Store transactions in India, generate a transaction report.

segment.source: You are responsible for reviewing the reporting and determining and complying with any obligations you have to register, collect, and remit taxes in connection with transactions involving your Application(s) or In-App Product(s).
segment.target: You are responsible for reviewing the reporting and determining and complying with any obligations you have to register, collect, and remit taxes in connection with transactions involving your Application(s) or In-App Product(s).

segment.source: Log on using the Microsoft account you use to access your Dev Center developer account.
segment.target: Log on using the Microsoft account you use to access your Dev Center developer account.

segment.source: In Sold to Country/Region, select India.
segment.target: In Sold to Country/Region, select India.

segment.source: Each row of the report contains the date and time of the transaction and, if available, the India state where the transaction occurred.
segment.target: Each row of the report contains the date and time of the transaction and, if available, the India state where the transaction occurred.
